headline: 2025 Ecolab Watermark™ Study Reveals Hidden Impact of Artificial Intelligence
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., October 30, 2025--Ecolab, a global sustainability leader offering water solutions and services, today announced findings from its third annual Ecolab Watermark™ Study, which reports on water stewardship around the world. This year’s research highlights water’s connection to timely global trends, including new business opportunities from the rapid growth of artificial intelligence (AI) and consumer concern about its impact on vital natural resources.
